item.title: ShoreTel Connect CLOUD Goes Way Beyond VoIP
item.description:
VoIP phone systems are often viewed as a direct substitute for conventional analog business phone systems, encompassing Key Telephone and PBX systems. The transition to this modern technology eliminates the need for separate phone and computer networks and allows businesses to move their internal switching system to the cloud. Moreover, switching to IP phones unlocks a wider array of features, often referred to as Unified Communications (UC). ShorTel, a recognized leader in business communications, is widely used by companies of all sizes...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/shoretel-connect-cloud-goes-way-beyond-voip/
